title: how to load custom module to caffe2 in cpp side?
body_html:
Caffe2:
I write a custom operator for YOLOV3 in caffe2, just like detectron module, I also make it as a module called YoloModule, and I write the CmakeList.txt for it ,in Module dir's CMakelist.txt I add a line with content 'add_subdirectory(YoloModule)', then I Recompiling the Whole Caffe2, and Succed, and generate the libYolo.so which is similarly to the libdetectron_gpu.so.

In Python side ,I could load libYolo.so to my project and work well, But In Cpp side , I failed to link my custom libYolo.so to libCaffe2.so ,I don't konw how to link this.( your comment in dyndep.py say :"In C++, this is usually done by either declaring dependency during compilation time, or via dynload. This allows us to do registration similarly on the Python side."), but I also could't Success，Please help me, thank you very much!
body_text:
Caffe2:
I write a custom operator for YOLOV3 in caffe2, just like detectron module, I also make it as a module called YoloModule, and I write the CmakeList.txt for it ,in Module dir's CMakelist.txt I add a line with content 'add_subdirectory(YoloModule)', then I Recompiling the Whole Caffe2, and Succed, and generate the libYolo.so which is similarly to the libdetectron_gpu.so.
In Python side ,I could load  libYolo.so to my project and work well, But In Cpp side , I failed to link my custom libYolo.so to libCaffe2.so ,I don't konw how to link this.( your comment  in dyndep.py  say :"In C++, this is usually done by either declaring dependency during compilation time, or via dynload. This allows us to do registration similarly on the Python side."), but I also could't Success，Please help me, thank you very much!
body:
Caffe2:
I write a custom operator for YOLOV3 in caffe2, just like detectron module, I also make it as a module called YoloModule, and I write the CmakeList.txt for it ,in Module dir's CMakelist.txt I add a line with content 'add_subdirectory(YoloModule)', then I Recompiling the Whole Caffe2, and Succed, and generate the libYolo.so which is similarly to the libdetectron_gpu.so.

In Python side ,I could load  libYolo.so to my project and work well, But In Cpp side , I failed to link my custom libYolo.so to libCaffe2.so ,I don't konw how to link this.( your comment  in dyndep.py  say :"In C++, this is usually done by either declaring dependency during compilation time, or via dynload. This allows us to do registration similarly on the Python side."), but I also could't Success，Please help me, thank you very much!
